00056     public void setConnection(Connection conn) {
00057         this.connection = new SQLConnectionDelegate(conn);
00058         try {
00059             connection.setAutoCommit(getAutoCommitMode());
00060         } catch (SQLException sqle) {
00061             log.warning("Can not set auto commit to " + getAutoCommitMode() + " on connection");
00062         }
00063     }
00064

00066         this.connection = conn;
00067         try {
00068             connection.setAutoCommit(getAutoCommitMode());
00069         } catch (SQLException sqle) {
00070             log.warning("Can not set auto commit to " + getAutoCommitMode() + " on connection");
00071         }
00072     }

00189     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00190         if (columnType.startsWith("java.sql.Types")) {
00191             String dataTypeName = columnType.substring(columnType.lastIndexOf(".") + 1);
00192             String precision = null;
00193             if (dataTypeName.indexOf("(") >= 0) {
00194                 precision = dataTypeName.substring(dataTypeName.indexOf("(") + 1, dataTypeName.indexOf(")"));
00195                 dataTypeName = dataTypeName.substring(0, dataTypeName.indexOf("("));
00196             }
00197 
00198             ResultSet resultSet = null;
00199             try {
00200                 DatabaseConnection connection = getConnection();
00201                 if (connection == null) {
00202                     throw new RuntimeException("Cannot evaluate java.sql.Types without a connection");
00203                 }
00204                 resultSet = connection.getMetaData().getTypeInfo();
00205                 while (resultSet.next()) {
00206                     String typeName = resultSet.getString("TYPE_NAME");
00207                     int dataType = resultSet.getInt("DATA_TYPE");
00208                     Integer requestedType = (Integer) Class.forName("java.sql.Types").getDeclaredField(dataTypeName).get(null);
00209                     if (requestedType == dataType) {
00210                         if (precision == null) {
00211                             return typeName;
00212                         } else {
00213                             return typeName + "(" + precision + ")";
00214                         }
00215                     }
00216                 }
00217                 //did not find type, fall back on our defaults for ones we can figure out
00218                 if (dataTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("BLOB")) {
00219                     return getBlobType();
00220                 } else if (dataTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("CLOB")) {
00221                     return getClobType();
00222                 } else if (dataTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("BOOLEAN")) {
00223                     return getBooleanType();
00224                 } else if (dataTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("DATE")) {
00225                     return getDateType();
00226                 } else if (dataTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("TIME")) {
00227                     return getTimeType();
00228                 }
00229 
00230                 throw new RuntimeException("Could not find java.sql.Types value for " + dataTypeName);
00231             } catch (Exception e) {
00232                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00233             } finally {
00234                 if (resultSet != null) {
00235                     try {
00236                         resultSet.close();
00237                     } catch (SQLException e) {
00238                         ;
00239                     }
00240                 }
00241             }
00242         } else if ("boolean".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00243             return getBooleanType();
00244         } else if ("currency".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00245             return getCurrencyType();
00246         } else if ("UUID".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00247             return getUUIDType();
00248         } else if ("BLOB".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)
00249                 || "LONGVARBINARY".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00250             return getBlobType();
00251         } else if ("CLOB".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)
00252                 || "TEXT".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)
00253                 || "LONGVARCHAR".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00254             return getClobType();
00255         } else if ("date".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00256             return getDateType();
00257         } else if ("time".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00258             return getTimeType();
00259         } else if ("dateTime".equalsIgnoreCase(columnType)) {
00260             return getDateTimeType();
00261         } else if (columnType.toUpperCase().startsWith("FLOAT(")) {
00262             return "FLOAT";
00263         } else if (columnType.toUpperCase().startsWith("DOUBLE(")) {
00264             return "DOUBLE";
00265         } else {
00266             return columnType;
00267         }
00268     }

00301     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00302         if (isDateOnly(isoDate) || isTimeOnly(isoDate)) {
00303             return "'" + isoDate + "'";
00304         } else if (isDateTime(isoDate)) {
00305             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00306             val.append("'");
00307             val.append(isoDate.substring(0, 10));
00308             val.append(" ");
00309 //noinspection MagicNumber
00310             val.append(isoDate.substring(11));
00311             val.append("'");
00312             return val.toString();
00313         } else {
00314             return "BAD_DATE_FORMAT:" + isoDate;
00315         }
00316     }
00317

00319     public String getDateLiteral(java.sql.Timestamp date) {
00320         return getDateLiteral(new ISODateFormat().format(date).replaceFirst("^'", "").replaceFirst("'$", ""));
00321     }
00322 
00323     public String getDateLiteral(java.sql.Date date) {
00324         return getDateLiteral(new ISODateFormat().format(date).replaceFirst("^'", "").replaceFirst("'$", ""));
00325     }
00326 
00327     public String getDateLiteral(java.sql.Time date) {
00328         return getDateLiteral(new ISODateFormat().format(date).replaceFirst("^'", "").replaceFirst("'$", ""));
00329     }
00330 
00331     public String getDateLiteral(Date date) {
00332         if (date instanceof java.sql.Date) {
00333             return getDateLiteral(((java.sql.Date) date));
00334         } else if (date instanceof java.sql.Time) {
00335             return getDateLiteral(((java.sql.Time) date));
00336         } else if (date instanceof Timestamp) {
00337             return getDateLiteral(((Timestamp) date));
00338         } else if (date instanceof ComputedDateValue) {
00339             return date.toString();
00340         } else {
00341             throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected type: " + date.getClass().getName());
00342         }
00343     }
00344 
00345     protected Date parseDate(String dateAsString) throws DateParseException {
00346         try {
00347             if (dateAsString.indexOf(" ") > 0) {
00348                 return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00349             } else {
00350                 if (dateAsString.indexOf(":") > 0) {
00351                     return new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00352                 } else {
00353                     return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(dateAsString);
00354                 }
00355             }
00356         } catch (ParseException e) {
00357             throw new DateParseException(dateAsString);
00358         }
00359     }
00360 
00361     protected boolean isDateOnly(String isoDate) {
00362         return isoDate.length() == "yyyy-MM-dd".length();
00363     }
00364 
00365     protected boolean isDateTime(String isoDate) {
00366         return isoDate.length() >= "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss".length();
00367     }
00368 
00369     protected boolean isTimeOnly(String isoDate) {
00370         return isoDate.length() == "hh:mm:ss".length();
00371     }

00401     public String getConcatSql(String... values) {
00402         StringBuffer returnString = new StringBuffer();
00403         for (String value : values) {
00404             returnString.append(value).append(" || ");
00405         }
00406 
00407         return returnString.toString().replaceFirst(" \\|\\| $", "");
00408     }

00420     private SqlStatement getChangeLogLockInsertSQL() {
00421         return new InsertStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName())
00422                 .addColumnValue("ID", 1)
00423                 .addColumnValue("LOCKED", Boolean.FALSE);
00424     }
00425 
00426     protected SqlStatement getCreateChangeLogLockSQL() {
00427         return new CreateTableStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName())
00428                 .addPrimaryKeyColumn("ID", "INT", new NotNullConstraint())
00429                 .addColumn("LOCKED", getBooleanType(), new NotNullConstraint())
00430                 .addColumn("LOCKGRANTED", getDateTimeType())
00431                 .addColumn("LOCKEDBY", "VARCHAR(255)");
00432     }
00433 
00434     protected SqlStatement getCreateChangeLogSQL() {
00435         return new CreateTableStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())
00436                 .addPrimaryKeyColumn("ID", "VARCHAR(63)", new NotNullConstraint())
00437                 .addPrimaryKeyColumn("AUTHOR", "VARCHAR(63)", new NotNullConstraint())
00438                 .addPrimaryKeyColumn("FILENAME", "VARCHAR(200)", new NotNullConstraint())
00439                 .addColumn("DATEEXECUTED", getDateTimeType(), new NotNullConstraint())
00440                 .addColumn("MD5SUM", "VARCHAR(32)")
00441                 .addColumn("DESCRIPTION", "VARCHAR(255)")
00442                 .addColumn("COMMENTS", "VARCHAR(255)")
00443                 .addColumn("TAG", "VARCHAR(255)")
00444                 .addColumn("LIQUIBASE", "VARCHAR(10)");
00445     }
00446 
00447     public SqlStatement getSelectChangeLogLockSQL() throws JDBCException {
00448         return new RawSqlStatement(("SELECT LOCKED FROM " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName()) + " WHERE ID=1"));
00449     }

00464     public void checkDatabaseChangeLogTable() throws JDBCException {
00465         DatabaseConnection connection = getConnection();
00466         ResultSet checkTableRS = null;
00467         ResultSet checkColumnsRS = null;
00468         List<SqlStatement> statementsToExecute = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00469 
00470         try {
00471             checkTableRS = connection.getMetaData().getTables(convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(getDefaultSchemaName()), convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(getDefaultSchemaName()), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName(), new String[]{"TABLE"});
00472             if (checkTableRS.next()) {
00473                 changeLogTableExists = true;
00474                 checkColumnsRS = connection.getMetaData().getColumns(convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(getDefaultSchemaName()), convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(getDefaultSchemaName()), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName(), null);
00475                 boolean hasDescription = false;
00476                 boolean hasComments = false;
00477                 boolean hasTag = false;
00478                 boolean hasLiquibase = false;
00479                 while (checkColumnsRS.next()) {
00480                     String columnName = checkColumnsRS.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00481                     if ("DESCRIPTION".equalsIgnoreCase(columnName)) {
00482                         hasDescription = true;
00483                     } else if ("COMMENTS".equalsIgnoreCase(columnName)) {
00484                         hasComments = true;
00485                     } else if ("TAG".equalsIgnoreCase(columnName)) {
00486                         hasTag = true;
00487                     } else if ("LIQUIBASE".equalsIgnoreCase(columnName)) {
00488                         hasLiquibase = true;
00489                     }
00490                 }
00491 
00492                 if (!hasDescription) {
00493                     statementsToExecute.add(new AddColumnStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName(), "DESCRIPTION", "VARCHAR(255)", null));
00494                 }
00495                 if (!hasTag) {
00496                     statementsToExecute.add(new AddColumnStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName(), "TAG", "VARCHAR(255)", null));
00497                 }
00498                 if (!hasComments) {
00499                     statementsToExecute.add(new AddColumnStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName(), "COMMENTS", "VARCHAR(255)", null));
00500                 }
00501                 if (!hasLiquibase) {
00502                     statementsToExecute.add(new AddColumnStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName(), "LIQUIBASE", "VARCHAR(255)", null));
00503                 }
00504 
00505             } else if (!changeLogCreateAttempted) {
00506                 changeLogCreateAttempted = true;
00507                 getJdbcTemplate().comment("Create Database Change Log Table");
00508                 SqlStatement createTableStatement = getCreateChangeLogSQL();
00509                 if (!canCreateChangeLogTable()) {
00510                     throw new JDBCException("Cannot create " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName()) + " table for your database.\n\n" +
00511                             "Please construct it manually using the following SQL as a base and re-run LiquiBase:\n\n" +
00512                             createTableStatement);
00513                 }
00514                 // If there is no table in the database for recording change history create one.
00515                 statementsToExecute.add(createTableStatement);
00516                 log.info("Creating database history table with name: " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName()));
00517                 changeLogTableExists = true;
00518 //                }
00519             }
00520 
00521             for (SqlStatement sql : statementsToExecute) {
00522                 this.getJdbcTemplate().execute(sql);
00523                 this.commit();
00524             }
00525         } catch (SQLException e) {
00526             throw new JDBCException(e);
00527         } finally {
00528             if (checkTableRS != null) {
00529                 try {
00530                     checkTableRS.close();
00531                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00532                     //noinspection ThrowFromFinallyBlock
00533                     throw new JDBCException(e);
00534                 }
00535             }
00536             if (checkColumnsRS != null) {
00537                 try {
00538                     checkColumnsRS.close();
00539                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00540                     //noinspection ThrowFromFinallyBlock
00541                     throw new JDBCException(e);
00542                 }
00543             }
00544         }
00545     }
00546 
00547     protected boolean canCreateChangeLogTable() throws JDBCException {
00548         return true;
00549     }
00550 
00556     public void checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable() throws JDBCException {
00557         DatabaseConnection connection = getConnection();
00558         ResultSet rs = null;
00559         boolean knowMustInsertIntoLockTable = false;
00560         try {
00561             rs = connection.getMetaData().getTables(convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(getDefaultSchemaName()), convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(getDefaultSchemaName()), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName(), new String[]{"TABLE"});
00562             if (!rs.next()) {
00563                 if (!changeLogLockCreateAttempted) {
00564                     changeLogLockCreateAttempted = true;
00565                     SqlStatement createTableStatement = getCreateChangeLogLockSQL();
00566 
00567                     getJdbcTemplate().comment("Create Database Lock Table");
00568                     this.getJdbcTemplate().execute(createTableStatement);
00569                     this.commit();
00570                     log.info("Created database lock table with name: " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName()));
00571                     changeLogLockTableExists = true;
00572                     knowMustInsertIntoLockTable = true;
00573                 }
00574             } else {
00575                 changeLogLockTableExists = true;
00576             }
00577             rs.close();
00578 
00579             if (changeLogLockTableExists) {
00580                 int rows = -1;
00581                 if (!knowMustInsertIntoLockTable) {
00582                     RawSqlStatement selectStatement = new RawSqlStatement("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName()) + " WHERE ID=1");
00583                     rows = this.getJdbcTemplate().queryForInt(selectStatement);
00584                 }
00585                 if (knowMustInsertIntoLockTable || rows == 0) {
00586                     this.getJdbcTemplate().update(getChangeLogLockInsertSQL());
00587                     this.commit();
00588                     log.info("Inserted lock row into: " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName()));
00589                     rs.close();
00590                 }
00591             } else {
00592                 throw new JDBCException("Change log lock table does not exist");
00593             }
00594 
00595         } catch (SQLException e) {
00596             throw new JDBCException(e);
00597         } finally {
00598             if (rs != null) {
00599                 try {
00600                     rs.close();
00601                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00602                     //noinspection ThrowFromFinallyBlock
00603                     throw new JDBCException(e);
00604                 }
00605             }
00606         }
00607     }
00608 
00609 // ------- DATABASE OBJECT DROPPING METHODS ---- //
00610 
00616     public void dropDatabaseObjects(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00617         try {
00618             DatabaseSnapshot snapshot = new DatabaseSnapshot(this, new HashSet<DiffStatusListener>(), schema);
00619 
00620             List<Change> dropChanges = new ArrayList<Change>();
00621 
00622             for (ForeignKey fk : snapshot.getForeignKeys()) {
00623                 DropForeignKeyConstraintChange dropFK = new DropForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00624                 dropFK.setBaseTableSchemaName(schema);
00625                 dropFK.setBaseTableName(fk.getForeignKeyTable().getName());
00626                 dropFK.setConstraintName(fk.getName());
00627 
00628                 dropChanges.add(dropFK);
00629             }
00630 
00631             for (View view : snapshot.getViews()) {
00632                 DropViewChange dropChange = new DropViewChange();
00633                 dropChange.setViewName(view.getName());
00634                 dropChange.setSchemaName(schema);
00635 
00636                 dropChanges.add(dropChange);
00637             }
00638 
00639 //            for (Index index : snapshot.getIndexes()) {
00640 //                DropIndexChange dropChange = new DropIndexChange();
00641 //                dropChange.setIndexName(index.getName());
00642 //                dropChange.setSchemaName(schema);
00643 //                dropChange.setTableName(index.getTableName());
00644 //
00645 //                dropChanges.add(dropChange);
00646 //            }
00647 
00648             for (Table table : snapshot.getTables()) {
00649                 DropTableChange dropChange = new DropTableChange();
00650                 dropChange.setSchemaName(schema);
00651                 dropChange.setTableName(table.getName());
00652 
00653                 dropChanges.add(dropChange);
00654             }
00655 
00656             if (this.supportsSequences()) {
00657                 for (Sequence seq : snapshot.getSequences()) {
00658                     DropSequenceChange dropChange = new DropSequenceChange();
00659                     dropChange.setSequenceName(seq.getName());
00660                     dropChange.setSchemaName(schema);
00661 
00662                     dropChanges.add(dropChange);
00663                 }
00664             }
00665 
00666 
00667             if (this.changeLogTableExists) {
00668                 RawSQLChange clearChangeLogChange = new RawSQLChange();
00669                 clearChangeLogChange.setSql("DELETE FROM " + escapeTableName(convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(getDefaultSchemaName()), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName()));
00670                 dropChanges.add(clearChangeLogChange);
00671             }
00672 
00673             try {
00674                 for (Change change : dropChanges) {
00675                     for (SqlStatement statement : change.generateStatements(this)) {
00676                         this.getJdbcTemplate().execute(statement);
00677                     }
00678                 }
00679             } catch (UnsupportedChangeException e) {
00680                 throw new JDBCException(e);
00681             }
00682 
00683         } finally {
00684             this.commit();
00685         }
00686     }
00687 
00688     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00689         if ("information_schema".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00690             return true;
00691         } else if (tableName.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName())) {
00692             return true;
00693         } else if (getSystemTablesAndViews().contains(tableName)) {
00694             return true;
00695         }
00696         return false;
00697     }
00698 
00699     public boolean isSystemView(String catalogName, String schemaName, String viewName) {
00700         if ("information_schema".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00701             return true;
00702         } else if (getSystemTablesAndViews().contains(viewName)) {
00703             return true;
00704         }
00705         return false;
00706     }
00707 
00708     public boolean isLiquibaseTable(String tableName) {
00709         return tableName.equalsIgnoreCase(this.getDatabaseChangeLogTableName()) || tableName.equalsIgnoreCase(this.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName());
00710     }
00711 
00712 // ------- DATABASE TAGGING METHODS ---- //
00713 
00717     public void tag(String tagString) throws JDBCException {
00718         try {
00719             int totalRows = this.getJdbcTemplate().queryForInt(new RawSqlStatement("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())));
00720             if (totalRows == 0) {
00721                 throw new JDBCException("Cannot tag an empty database");
00722             }
00723 
00724             Timestamp lastExecutedDate = (Timestamp) this.getJdbcTemplate().queryForObject(createChangeToTagSQL(), Timestamp.class);
00725             int rowsUpdated = this.getJdbcTemplate().update(createTagSQL(tagString, lastExecutedDate));
00726             if (rowsUpdated == 0) {
00727                 throw new JDBCException("Did not tag database change log correctly.  Should have tagged changeset from "+lastExecutedDate.toString());
00728             }
00729             this.commit();
00730         } catch (Exception e) {
00731             throw new JDBCException(e);
00732         }
00733     }
00734 
00738     protected SqlStatement createChangeToTagSQL() {
00739         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT MAX(DATEEXECUTED) FROM " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName()));
00740     }
00741 
00749     protected SqlStatement createTagSQL(String tagName, Date dateExecuted) {
00750         UpdateStatement statement = new UpdateStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName());
00751         statement.addNewColumnValue("TAG", tagName);
00752         statement.setWhereClause("DATEEXECUTED = ?");
00753         statement.addWhereParameter(dateExecuted);
00754 
00755         return statement;
00756     }
00757 
00758     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00759         return null;
00760     }
00761 
00762     public boolean doesTagExist(String tag) throws JDBCException {
00763         int count = this.getJdbcTemplate().queryForInt(new RawSqlStatement("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM " + escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName()) + " WHERE TAG='" + tag + "'"));
00764         return count > 0;
00765     }

00767     public DatabaseSnapshot getSnapshot() throws JDBCException {
00768         return new DatabaseSnapshot(this);
00769     }

00772     public String toString() {
00773         if (getConnection() == null) {
00774             return getProductName() + " Database";
00775         }
00776         try {
00777             return getConnectionUsername() + " @ " + getConnectionURL() + (getDefaultSchemaName() == null?"":" (Default Schema: "+getDefaultSchemaName()+")");
00778         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00779             return super.toString();
00780         }
00781     }

00784     public boolean shouldQuoteValue(String value) {
00785         return true;
00786     }
00787 
00788     public String getViewDefinition(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00789         if (schemaName == null) {
00790             schemaName = convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName);
00791         }
00792         String definition = (String) this.getJdbcTemplate().queryForObject(getViewDefinitionSql(schemaName, viewName), String.class);
00793         if (definition == null) {
00794             return null;
00795         }
00796         return definition.replaceFirst("^CREATE VIEW [\\S]+ AS", "");
00797     }
00798 
00799     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00800         String sql = "select view_definition from information_schema.views where upper(table_name)='" + viewName.toUpperCase() + "'";
00801         if (convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schemaName) != null) {
00802             sql += " and table_schema='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'";
00803         } else if (convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schemaName) != null) {
00804             sql += " and table_catalog='" + convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schemaName) + "'";
00805         }
00806 
00807         log.info("GetViewDefinitionSQL: " + sql);
00808         return new RawSqlStatement(sql);
00809     }
00810 
00811 
00812     public int getDatabaseType(int type) {
00813         int returnType = type;
00814         if (returnType == Types.BOOLEAN) {
00815             String booleanType = getBooleanType();
00816             if (!booleanType.equalsIgnoreCase("boolean")) {
00817                 returnType = Types.TINYINT;
00818             }
00819         }
00820 
00821         return returnType;
00822     }
00823 
00824     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00825         if (defaultValue == null) {
00826             return null;
00827         } else if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00828             return convertToCorrectJavaType(((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^'", "").replaceFirst("'$", ""), dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00829         } else {
00830             return defaultValue;
00831         }
00832     }
00833 
00834     protected Object convertToCorrectJavaType(String value, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00835         if (value == null) {
00836             return null;
00837         }
00838         if (dataType == Types.CLOB || dataType == Types.VARCHAR || dataType == Types.CHAR || dataType == Types.LONGVARCHAR) {
00839             if (value.equalsIgnoreCase("NULL")) {
00840                 return null;
00841             } else {
00842                 return value;
00843             }
00844         }
00845 
00846         value = StringUtils.trimToNull(value);
00847         if (value == null) {
00848             return null;
00849         }
00850 
00851         try {
00852             if (dataType == Types.DATE) {
00853                 return new java.sql.Date(parseDate(value).getTime());
00854             } else if (dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00855                 return new Timestamp(parseDate(value).getTime());
00856             } else if (dataType == Types.TIME) {
00857                 return new Time(parseDate(value).getTime());
00858             } else if (dataType == Types.BIGINT) {
00859                 return new BigInteger(value);
00860             } else if (dataType == Types.BIT) {
00861                 if (value.equalsIgnoreCase("true")) {
00862                     return Boolean.TRUE;
00863                 } else if (value.equalsIgnoreCase("false")) {
00864                     return Boolean.FALSE;
00865                 } else if (value.equals("1")) {
00866                     return Boolean.TRUE;
00867                 } else if (value.equals("0")) {
00868                     return Boolean.FALSE;
00869                 } else if (value.equals("(1)")) {
00870                     return Boolean.TRUE;
00871                 } else if (value.equals("(0)")) {
00872                     return Boolean.FALSE;
00873                 }
00874                 throw new ParseException("Unknown bit value: " + value, 0);
00875             } else if (dataType == Types.BOOLEAN) {
00876                 return Boolean.valueOf(value);
00877             } else if (dataType == Types.DECIMAL) {
00878                 if (decimalDigits == 0) {
00879                     return new Integer(value);
00880                 }
00881                 return new Double(value);
00882             } else if (dataType == Types.DOUBLE || dataType == Types.NUMERIC) {
00883                 return new Double(value);
00884             } else if (dataType == Types.FLOAT) {
00885                 return new Float(value);
00886             } else if (dataType == Types.INTEGER) {
00887                 return new Integer(value);
00888             } else if (dataType == Types.NULL) {
00889                 return null;
00890             } else if (dataType == Types.REAL) {
00891                 return new Float(value);
00892             } else if (dataType == Types.SMALLINT) {
00893                 return new Integer(value);
00894             } else if (dataType == Types.TINYINT) {
00895                 return new Integer(value);
00896             } else {
00897                 throw new RuntimeException("Cannot convert type: " + dataType);
00898             }
00899         } catch (DateParseException e) {
00900             return new ComputedDateValue(value);
00901         } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
00902             return new ComputedNumericValue(value);
00903         }
00904     }
00905 
00906     public String convertJavaObjectToString(Object value) {
00907         if (value != null) {
00908             if (value instanceof String) {
00909                 if ("null".equalsIgnoreCase(((String) value))) {
00910                     return null;
00911                 }
00912                 return "'" + ((String) value).replaceAll("'", "''") + "'";
00913             } else if (value instanceof Number) {
00914                 return value.toString();
00915             } else if (value instanceof Boolean) {
00916                 String returnValue;
00917                 if (((Boolean) value)) {
00918                     returnValue = this.getTrueBooleanValue();
00919                 } else {
00920                     returnValue = this.getFalseBooleanValue();
00921                 }
00922                 if (returnValue.matches("\\d+")) {
00923                     return returnValue;
00924                 } else {
00925                     return "'" + returnValue + "'";
00926                 }
00927             } else if (value instanceof java.sql.Date) {
00928                 return this.getDateLiteral(((java.sql.Date) value));
00929             } else if (value instanceof java.sql.Time) {
00930                 return this.getDateLiteral(((java.sql.Time) value));
00931             } else if (value instanceof java.sql.Timestamp) {
00932                 return this.getDateLiteral(((java.sql.Timestamp) value));
00933             } else {
00934                 throw new RuntimeException("Unknown default value type: " + value.getClass().getName());
00935             }
00936         } else {
00937             return null;
00938         }
00939     }
00940 
00941     public String escapeTableName(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00942         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName) == null || !supportsSchemas()) {
00943             return tableName;
00944         } else {
00945             return schemaName + "." + tableName;
00946         }
00947     }
00948 
00949     public String escapeSequenceName(String schemaName, String sequenceName) {
00950         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName) == null || !supportsSchemas()) {
00951             return sequenceName;
00952         } else {
00953             return schemaName + "." + sequenceName;
00954         }
00955     }
00956 
00957     public String convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00958         if (getDefaultCatalogName() == null) {
00959             return null;
00960         } else {
00961             if (requestedSchema == null) {
00962                 return getDefaultCatalogName();
00963             }
00964             return StringUtils.trimToNull(requestedSchema);
00965         }
00966     }
00967 
00968     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00969         String returnSchema = requestedSchema;
00970         if (returnSchema == null) {
00971             returnSchema = getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName();
00972         }
00973 
00974         if (returnSchema != null) {
00975             returnSchema = returnSchema.toUpperCase();
00976         }
00977         return returnSchema;
00978     }
00979 
00980     public boolean supportsSchemas() {
00981         return true;
00982     }
00983 
00984     public String generatePrimaryKeyName(String tableName) {
00985         return "PK_" + tableName.toUpperCase();
00986     }
00987 
00988     public String escapeViewName(String schemaName, String viewName) {
00989         return escapeTableName(schemaName, viewName);
00990     }
00991 
00992     public boolean isColumnAutoIncrement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00993         if (!supportsAutoIncrement()) {
00994             return false;
00995         }
00996 
00997         boolean autoIncrement = false;
00998 
00999         ResultSet selectRS = null;
01000         try {
01001             selectRS = getConnection().createStatement().executeQuery("SELECT " + columnName + " FROM " + escapeTableName(schemaName, tableName) + " WHERE 1 = 0");
01002             ResultSetMetaData meta = selectRS.getMetaData();
01003             autoIncrement = meta.isAutoIncrement(1);
01004         } finally {
01005             if (selectRS != null) {
01006                 selectRS.close();
01007             }
01008         }
01009 
01010         return autoIncrement;
01011     }
01012 
01016     public ChangeSet.RunStatus getRunStatus(ChangeSet changeSet) throws JDBCException, DatabaseHistoryException {
01017         if (!doesChangeLogTableExist()) {
01018             return ChangeSet.RunStatus.NOT_RAN;
01019         }
01020 
01021         RanChangeSet foundRan = getRanChangeSet(changeSet);
01022 
01023         if (foundRan == null) {
01024             return ChangeSet.RunStatus.NOT_RAN;
01025         } else {
01026             if (foundRan.getMd5sum() == null) {
01027                 try {
01028                     log.info("Updating NULL md5sum for " + changeSet.toString());
01029                     DatabaseConnection connection = getConnection();
01030                     PreparedStatement updatePstmt = connection.prepareStatement("UPDATE "+escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())+" SET MD5SUM=? WHERE ID=? AND AUTHOR=? AND FILENAME=?");
01031                     updatePstmt.setString(1, changeSet.getMd5sum());
01032                     updatePstmt.setString(2, changeSet.getId());
01033                     updatePstmt.setString(3, changeSet.getAuthor());
01034                     updatePstmt.setString(4, changeSet.getFilePath());
01035 
01036                     updatePstmt.executeUpdate();
01037                     updatePstmt.close();
01038                     this.commit();
01039                 } catch (SQLException e) {
01040                     throw new JDBCException(e);
01041                 }
01042 
01043                 return ChangeSet.RunStatus.ALREADY_RAN;
01044             } else {
01045                 if (foundRan.getMd5sum().equals(changeSet.getMd5sum())) {
01046                     return ChangeSet.RunStatus.ALREADY_RAN;
01047                 } else {
01048                     if (changeSet.shouldRunOnChange()) {
01049                         return ChangeSet.RunStatus.RUN_AGAIN;
01050                     } else {
01051                         return ChangeSet.RunStatus.INVALID_MD5SUM;
01052 //                        throw new DatabaseHistoryException("MD5 Check for " + changeSet.toString() + " failed");
01053                     }
01054                 }
01055             }
01056         }
01057     }
01058 
01059     public RanChangeSet getRanChangeSet(ChangeSet changeSet) throws JDBCException, DatabaseHistoryException {
01060         if (!doesChangeLogTableExist()) {
01061             throw new DatabaseHistoryException("Database change table does not exist");
01062         }
01063 
01064         RanChangeSet foundRan = null;
01065         for (RanChangeSet ranChange : getRanChangeSetList()) {
01066             if (ranChange.isSameAs(changeSet)) {
01067                 foundRan = ranChange;
01068                 break;
01069             }
01070         }
01071         return foundRan;
01072     }
01073 
01077     public List<RanChangeSet> getRanChangeSetList() throws JDBCException {
01078         try {
01079             String databaseChangeLogTableName = escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName());
01080             List<RanChangeSet> ranChangeSetList = new ArrayList<RanChangeSet>();
01081             if (doesChangeLogTableExist()) {
01082                 log.info("Reading from " + databaseChangeLogTableName);
01083                 String sql = "SELECT * FROM " + databaseChangeLogTableName + " ORDER BY DATEEXECUTED ASC".toUpperCase();
01084                 Statement statement = getConnection().createStatement();
01085                 ResultSet rs = statement.executeQuery(sql);
01086                 while (rs.next()) {
01087                     String fileName = rs.getString("FILENAME");
01088                     String author = rs.getString("AUTHOR");
01089                     String id = rs.getString("ID");
01090                     String md5sum = rs.getString("MD5SUM");
01091                     Date dateExecuted = rs.getTimestamp("DATEEXECUTED");
01092                     String tag = rs.getString("TAG");
01093                     RanChangeSet ranChangeSet = new RanChangeSet(fileName, id, author, md5sum, dateExecuted, tag);
01094                     ranChangeSetList.add(ranChangeSet);
01095                 }
01096                 rs.close();
01097                 statement.close();
01098             }
01099             return ranChangeSetList;
01100         } catch (SQLException e) {
01101             if (!getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
01102                 //probably not created, no problem
01103                 return new ArrayList<RanChangeSet>();
01104             } else {
01105                 throw new JDBCException(e);
01106             }
01107         }
01108     }
01109 
01110     public Date getRanDate(ChangeSet changeSet) throws JDBCException, DatabaseHistoryException {
01111         RanChangeSet ranChange = getRanChangeSet(changeSet);
01112         if (ranChange == null) {
01113             return null;
01114         } else {
01115             return ranChange.getDateExecuted();
01116         }
01117     }
01118 
01123     public void markChangeSetAsRan(ChangeSet changeSet) throws JDBCException {
01124         String dateValue = getCurrentDateTimeFunction();
01125 
01126         InsertStatement statement = new InsertStatement(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName());
01127         statement.addColumnValue("ID", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getId()));
01128         statement.addColumnValue("AUTHOR", changeSet.getAuthor());
01129         statement.addColumnValue("FILENAME", changeSet.getFilePath());
01130         statement.addColumnValue("DATEEXECUTED", new ComputedDateValue(dateValue));
01131         statement.addColumnValue("MD5SUM", changeSet.getMd5sum());
01132         statement.addColumnValue("DESCRIPTION", limitSize(changeSet.getDescription()));
01133         statement.addColumnValue("COMMENTS", limitSize(StringUtils.trimToEmpty(changeSet.getComments())));
01134         statement.addColumnValue("LIQUIBASE", LiquibaseUtil.getBuildVersion());
01135 
01136 
01137         this.getJdbcTemplate().execute(statement);
01138 
01139         getRanChangeSetList().add(new RanChangeSet(changeSet));
01140     }
01141 
01142     public void markChangeSetAsReRan(ChangeSet changeSet) throws JDBCException {
01143         String dateValue = getCurrentDateTimeFunction();
01144         String sql = "UPDATE DATABASECHANGELOG SET DATEEXECUTED=" + dateValue + ", MD5SUM='?' WHERE ID='?' AND AUTHOR='?' AND FILENAME='?'";
01145         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getMd5sum()));
01146         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getId()));
01147         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getAuthor()));
01148         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getFilePath()));
01149 
01150         this.getJdbcTemplate().execute(new RawSqlStatement(sql));
01151         this.commit();
01152     }
01153 
01154     public void removeRanStatus(ChangeSet changeSet) throws JDBCException {
01155         String sql = "DELETE FROM DATABASECHANGELOG WHERE ID='?' AND AUTHOR='?' AND FILENAME='?'";
01156         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getId()));
01157         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getAuthor()));
01158         sql = sql.replaceFirst("\\?", escapeStringForDatabase(changeSet.getFilePath()));
01159 
01160         this.getJdbcTemplate().execute(new RawSqlStatement(sql));
01161         commit();
01162     }
01163 
01164     public String escapeStringForDatabase(String string) {
01165         return string.replaceAll("'", "''");
01166     }
01167 
01168     private String limitSize(String string) {
01169         int maxLength = 255;
01170         if (string.length() > maxLength) {
01171             return string.substring(0, maxLength - 3) + "...";
01172         }
01173         return string;
01174     }
01175 
01176     public void commit() throws JDBCException {
01177         try {
01178             getConnection().commit();
01179         } catch (SQLException e) {
01180             throw new JDBCException(e);
01181         }
01182     }
01183 
01184     public void rollback() throws JDBCException {
01185         try {
01186             getConnection().rollback();
01187         } catch (SQLException e) {
01188             throw new JDBCException(e);
01189         }
01190     }
01191 
01192     public JdbcTemplate getJdbcTemplate() {
01193         return jdbcTemplate;
01194     }
01195 
01196     public void setJdbcTemplate(JdbcTemplate template) {
01197         this.jdbcTemplate = template;
01198     }
01199 
01200     public boolean equals(Object o) {
01201         if (this == o) return true;
01202         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
01203 
01204         AbstractDatabase that = (AbstractDatabase) o;
01205 
01206         return !(connection != null ? !connection.equals(that.connection) : that.connection != null);
01207 
01208     }
01209 
01210     public int hashCode() {
01211         return (connection != null ? connection.hashCode() : 0);
01212     }
01213 
01214     public void close() throws JDBCException {
01215         try {
01216             DatabaseConnection connection = getConnection();
01217             if (connection != null) {
01218                 connection.close();
01219             }
01220         } catch (SQLException e) {
01221             throw new JDBCException(e);
01222         }
01223     }
